channel.title: Carloop Schematics - several versions exist - what's the correct one?
channel.description: There are several versions of PDF's for the Carloop hardware. Some show that there is a Carloop2-v3.1 shows a CAN_INT indicating that there is an interrupt pin. I'd like to be able to wake/sleep my device based on a CAN interrupt. Is that possible?

item.title: Carloop Schematics - several versions exist - what's the correct one?
item.dc:creator: cyclin_al1
item.description:
@nlwelch,

You should find it here:

github.com

//github.com/carloop/hardware/tree/master/Carloop.v2

Read full topic
item.source: Carloop Schematics - several versions exist - what's the correct one?

item.title: Carloop Schematics - several versions exist - what's the correct one?
item.dc:creator: nlwelch
item.description:
Thought I should add that my pcb has a label of R2.3 2016/05 by JV. Can’t seem to find the schematic that aligns with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Carloop Schematics - several versions exist - what's the correct one?

item.title: Carloop Schematics - several versions exist - what's the correct one?
item.dc:creator: nlwelch
item.description:
There are several versions of PDF’s for the Carloop hardware. Some show that there is a Carloop2-v3.1 shows a CAN_INT indicating that there is an interrupt pin. I’d like to be able to wake/sleep my device based on a CAN interrupt. Is that possible?

Read full topic
